actor.description: An address that can be used within the Andromeda ecosystem...
actor.title: Actor

action.ui:title: Action
action.ui:description: Specify the action for which permission should be removed.

actor.ui:title: Actor
actor.ui:description: Enter the address of the actor from whom permission should be removed. This address can be a human-readable address or a VFS path.
actor.ui:help: The address can be in the format 'cosmos1...' for human-readable addresses or '/home/user/app/component' for VFS paths.
